titleStmt.title: England's deliverance from popery and slavery and the piety and justice of King William and Queen Mary of ever blessed memory, in ascending the throne of these dominions, asserted.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Eleanor Smith, and are to be sold by John Whitlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Engraved portraits of William and Mary.
